decision_conditions: Under the provisions of s.73 of the Town and Country Planning Act 1990, the proposal to carry out development without compliance in relation to Condition 4 (Cycle Parking) of Planning Permission reference 22/02826/FUL would not only place undue pressure on existing cycle parking facilities within the area but also fail to promote sustainable transport. The proposal would be contrary to policy T5 of the London Plan 2021 and policies CS6 and DM8 of the LDF Core Strategy 2012.
